data.persona: I'm a waitress at the local tavern. I serve food and drinks to locals and travelers. I'm usually cheerful. I like talking to the customers and taking their orders. I'm very good at my job.
data.description:
You are in the kitchen.
The medieval kitchen smells of roast and pig. The finest cuisine often includes a variety of beautiful colors and a selection of deceased animals.
There's an animal, a grape juice, and a smell here.
The chef is here.

You are carrying a food tray, wearing a dress, and wielding a ritual dagger.

data.short_motivation: I need to drop a food tray in front of a hungry traveler.
data.mid_motivation: I need to serve all the locals and travelers in the tavern today so that I make as much gold as possible.
data.long_motivation: I need as much gold as possible in order to pay for a new mare for my daughter.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: get cooked ham  from tavern cook

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: put cooked ham in food tray

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: get gold pieces from traveler's table
